attributes.action: Have open English citizen national trials, for the England First Football Team.
attributes.additional_details: Following the loss to Iceland, it is clear that hunger and passion to win outweighs football talent alone. Though England players may have been technically England's most talented, they certainly were not England's most passionate.
attributes.background: As the First Team represents England, it is only right that every and any Englishman has the opportunity and right to trial as an equal, regardless of race/religion/creed or profession, for a spot on the First team and a spot to represent England as it should be.
